group_1.narration: Everything about this world, this life,@is so boring.
That's why I decided to become a@Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, hello, Masara.@How did it go?

group_1.textRight: Okay.@I beat last year's time by 2 seconds...

group_1.textLeft: That's wonderful!@I'm so proud of you.

group_1.narration: My parents pushed me to start swimming@when I was a little kid.
But no matter how far or how fast @I could swim, it never made me feel@happy or satisfied.
Despite that, I kept going, thinking that@things might change one day...@But even now, I've never had@any kind of passion for swimming.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, you saw that movie?!@How was it?!

group_1.textRight: It had me totally in tears!@It was so, so good! It's a must-watch!

group_1.textLeft: You only like it because you're crazy@about its star, that Yamazaki guy!

group_1.textRight: Nope. It would have been great@even without him! Honestly!

group_1.narration: It's not just swimming or school though.
Movies, music, TV shows, celebrities...@All the other girls naturally@seem to like things like that...@But I've never found anything@that excites me.

group_1.textLeft: It's not the end of the world...!
We still have next year's inter-high @event!

group_1.narration: I'm not looking down on them.@I guess I could even say I'm jealous.@Being passionate about something...@That makes you cry...or upset...
If I had something like that,@I wonder how much more fun@these boring, repetitive days would become.

group_1.textRight: A Magical Girl's mission is to@defeat Witches.

group_1.narration: Magical Girls...@That was the first and only thing that ever@struck a chord with me.
Magical Girls, Witches...@Things like that just didn't exist in the@world I knew up to that point.
I thought it might be a way to@break free from the boredom of my life.
That was my motivation when I agreed to@the contract and became a Magical Girl.
